alert.note: Alert for Northern Oregon Cascade Foothills (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued February 22 at 9:55PM PST until February 24 at 12:00PM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING HAS BEEN REPLACED BY A WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY, WHICH IS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST THURSDAY... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON PST FRIDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 10 below zero. * WHERE...Northern Oregon Cascade Foothills. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 10 AM PST Thursday. For the Wind Chill Advisory, until noon PST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1, or visit for Oregon: https://www.tripcheck.com and for Washington: https://wsdot.com/travel/real-time/map
